goal.en: Quantum photonics technology has progressed rapidly and become a predominant solution for the realization of optical quantum computing, quantum communication, and quantum metrology which are believed to provide supremacy power in information processing, building (unconditionally) secure communication, and elevating sensing resolution, respectively. In this course, we focus on the fundamentals and applications of quantum photonics, including the generation of entangled photons and the initiation of quantum processes. This technology will be discussed in realizing integrated photonic elements, including sources, optical functionalities, and detectors, as building blocks for implementing scalable quantum photonic systems.
goal.ch: 量子光電技術的快速進展已成為實現光量子計算、量子通訊和量子量測的主要解決方案，是實現高速資訊處理、（無條件）安全通訊和超高感測解析力等應用系統的關鍵技術。在本課程中，我們將重點放在量子光電學的基礎知識和應用，包括糾纏光子的生成和量子過程的啟始。我們亦將介紹如何以積體光子學實現包括量子光源、各式光電元件和光子偵測器等作為建構可擴充量子光電系統的基本組件來討論量子光電技術。

content.en:
四、課程大網：
I. Introduction
II. Chip-based Integrated Photonics
• Optical waveguides
• Types of waveguides
• Design and fabrication of integrated waveguides
• Integrated photonic materials
• Integrated photonic devices
• Integrated quantum photonic circuits
III. Laser Sources
• Types of lasers
• Fiber / solid-state / semiconductor lasers
• Design and fabrication of silicon-based lasers
IV. Quantum Sources
• Photon pairs and entangled photon pairs
• Nonlinear four-wave mixing (FWM) and frequency comb generation
• Frequency entanglement and correlation.
• High-dimensional frequency-bin photonics entanglement
V. Quantum Signal Processing
• Frequency-Time domain mapping
• Space-to-Time domain shaping with quantum states
• Experimental techniques in quantum optics
VI. Fabrication, Integration, and Packaging
• Fiber-to-waveguide interconnection of silicon photonics devices
• Integration of silicon photonics with electronics
